item.title: Spectral analysis for compressible quantum fluids
item.description: We have a new manuscript out on spectral analysis for compressible quantum fluids. We develop a rigorous formulation of the spectral density problem with formal and numerical advantages. It can be used to calculate accurate spectral densities and correlation functions for compressible and incompressible velocity fields. Check it out at https://arxiv.org/abs/2112.04012
